entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Ottawa (Richmond - Metcalfe)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:22 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Dewpoint: -2.4°C
Wind: WSW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning in the afternoon then changing to rain late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
